description: Banana and oat pancakes are lighter and more nutritious than traditional pancakes and just as delicious.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg,Raspberry,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Banana Oat Pancakes with Vanilla Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the milk, egg yolks, bananas, half the vanilla and oats in a blender, blitz to form a smooth batter and pour into a large bowl. Place the egg whites in a large bowl and whisk to stiff peaks with a handheld electric whisk.
Whisk 2-3 tablespoons of egg whites into the batter and fold in the rest until well incorporated.

Heat a drizzle of oil in a non-stick pan on medium high heat and spoon 2 tablespoons of batter in. Cook for 1-2 minutes until bubbles appear on the surface and the edges begin to set, then carefully flip and cook for 1 minute on the other side. Repeat with the rest of the batter.
Mix the remaining vanilla into the yoghurt and serve with the pancakes, topped with berries.
